api_list.api_description: Perform reverse geocoding to get address from coordinates.

required_parameters.name: lat
required_parameters.description: Latitude of the point to reverse geocode.

required_parameters.name: lon
required_parameters.description: Longitude of the point to reverse geocode.

api_list.api_description: Convert an amount from one currency to another using real-time rates.

optional_parameters.name: base_currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency code of the base currency.

optional_parameters.name: amount
optional_parameters.description: The amount in base currency to convert.

optional_parameters.name: target_currency
optional_parameters.description: The currency code to convert the base currency to.
